title: Playground Engineer
subtitle: A Collection of Lessons that help you learn Game and App development using Swift

documents.title: Artist
documents.detailSubtitle: Use Swift to design your own abstract designs
documents.description:
See the power and fun of coding as you customize the sample projects to create your own digital art. 

This book is divided into three main parts: 
 SprieKit concepts 
 Sample Projects 
 Student Projects 

 Go over the concepts first, play with sample projects and then have fun creating your own projects!
